
Question
========


Consider a process  $y_t  = 4 + 0.8 y_{t-1} - 0.2 y_{t-2} + 0.6 y_{t-12} + u_t - 0.5 u_{t-1} +  0.2 u_{t-2} - 0.1 u_{t-12}$. 

Which SARIMA(p,d,q)[P,D,Q] model describes $y_t$.



Answerlist
----------
* SARIMA(2,1,2)[1,1,1]
* SARIMA(1,0,1)[2,0,2]
* SARIMA(2,0,2)[1,0,1]
* SARIMA(12,0,12)[0,0,0]
